alert.note: Alert for Wind River Basin (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 10 at 3:15PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Fremont County through 345 PM MDT... At 314 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Arapahoe, which is also near Riverton, moving east at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail along with very heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... South Riverton around 325 PM MDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Very heavy rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
